biography.summary: John Cornyn is a Republican United States Senator from Texas, serving since 2003. He has held leadership positions including Senate Minority Whip (2013-2015) and Senate Majority Whip (2015-2017, 2017-2019). His work covers immigration, national security, fiscal policy, and judiciary matters.

contact.office_address: 517 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Elected United States Senator representing Texas.
